settings.heading:
Customised, Safe
Hair Treatment Plans
settings.subheading: Complete an online hair test so we can help you find a treatment plan basis the root cause of your hair issues. The plans are co-created with doctors from Ayurveda and Dermatology field.

settings.femaleContent: Excessive Hair fall 4 to 6 months after delivery. Get natural, breastfeeding safe treatment
Nutrients build the hair fibre and define texture, quality and strength. Deficiency leads to hair fall.
Stress shifts hair root to rest phase leading to excessive hair fall.
Excessive androgen hormones lead to hair fall that is slow but makes the scalp visible
The shift in hormones accelerates hair fall leading to widening-partition of hair (Female pattern hair fall)
DHT(androgenic alopecia) causes hair roots to shrink and hair to thin and fall out.
Poor energy levels is a sign that your weight or metabolism could be the real cause of hair fall.
Pollution, sun, chemical exposure to hair especially keratin and straightening treatments trigger hair fall.

settings.question: Will Traya treatment work for me?
settings.answer: Yes! Traya will absolutely work for you if your hair loss is between Stages 1-4. (To find out your stage. Take the FREE hair test). Traya’s holistic 3 science formula uses the goodness of Dermatology Ayurveda and Nutrition to help with your hair loss. Our Women Santulan Technology works on specific women needs depending on her existing condition like Pregnancy, Menopause, problems like PCOS along with hair loss. This technology compliments Traya’s holistic 3 science formula, along with our FDA-approved Growth Actives and your own personalised diet to ensure you have the healthy hair you deserve.

settings.question: Is Traya treatment safe for women?
settings.answer: Absolutely! Traya’s hair growth treatment is not only safe and toxin free but also doctor-prescribed. Traya's treatment plans also have NO SIDE EFFECTS. Traya’s treatment uses Ayurvedic herbs and FDA approved hair growth actives which are very safe and incredibly effective for your hair.

settings.question: What will my Traya treatment contain?
settings.answer: Traya's holistic & personalised treatment plan combines 3 Sciences of Dermatology, Ayurveda and Nutrition which includes FDA-approved dermatology products, and natural Ayurvedic supplements. You also get a digital prescription signed by doctors, a personal hair coach who guides you throughout the treatment and a healing diet plan which will support your internal health to ensure you have the healthy hair you deserve.

settings.question: How to start Traya Treatment?
settings.answer:
It is incredibly easy! Take Traya’s free hair test from the button on the banner (scroll up to the topmost section) .Once you've taken the hair test and have uploaded your scalp picture, a customised kit will be recommended to you based on the root cause of your hair fall, type and stage of hair loss. You can then proceed to buy the doctor-recommended treatment plan. Once you place the order, Traya's doctors will prescribe your treatment and create a digital prescription for you.
You will be able to access this prescription by scanning the QR code on your kit when it is delivered and start the treatment!

settings.question: When will I see results? / How long will the treatment take?
settings.answer:
Hair growth is a gradual process. Traya’s treatment takes care of your overall health therefore, you will start seeing small changes in your body within a month. For your hair to grow back, it will take an average of about 5 months on regularly using the complete treatment plan. However, the exact time to see these results may vary depending on factors like your age, type, stage, and the causes behind your hair loss like stress, hormonal imbalances, poor diet, etc.
Staying consistent with our treatment also ensures faster, more effective results, as over 2.5 lakh other Indians have already seen.

settings.question: Will Traya’s treatment make my hair thicker?
settings.answer: Yes, Traya’s treatment helps promote hair growth and thickness by using our holistic 3 science formula which combines the goodness of ayurveda, dermatological products and the right nutrition which helps improve the overall health of your hair, making it thicker and stronger.

settings.question: Can Traya treatment reduce dandruff?
settings.answer: Yes, Traya's antifungal treatment gets rid of both mild & heavy dandruff by preventing the growth of dandruff-causing fungus which helps improve your scalp health and soothes it. It also makes sure that the flakiness and itchiness you might be having is also reduced.

settings.question: Can women of all ages see results with  Traya’s treatment?
settings.answer:
Yes, Traya's treatment helps women of all age groups (16+). We work hard to ensure that your treatment plan is customised and personalised to your age, hair fall type, your stage and internal root causes of your hair fall. Traya’s treatment is effective for everyone from teenagers and new moms, to even menopausal women suffering from hair loss. However, since age is a big factor when it comes to seeing results the time for positive visible results might vary.
You will also have a hair coach assigned to you to ensure that we are able to give you the support you personally require on your journey.

settings.question: Who is Traya hair coach?
settings.answer: The Traya hair coach will be your point of contact throughout the treatment. They will be assigned to you once your order is placed, to help you stay on track, and guide you throughout the treatment journey, take updates from doctors to monitor your progress and follow up with you to ensure better results. They will also be available for you to reach out too whenever you have doubts about your treatment.

settings.heading: Disclaimers
settings.row_content:
The claims and results mentioned are based on multiple internal studies and customer research surveys that Traya has conducted with a statistically significant sample size of users who were under expert observation and guidance

93% saw results*

Traya conducted an internal study over both men and females facing hair fall and 93% saw results* after using the complete Traya treatment consistently for a period of 5 months. This study was conducted in December 2022. 

5-month money-back guarantee

Traya’s 100% money-back policy is valid only if you have been regular with the complete treatment plan for a period of 5 whole consecutive months. Each customised hair kit is valid for only 30 days. If any individual has not seen any regrowth or control in hair fall, you can ask for a refund. However, once you apply for the 5-month - money-back policy, the team would then do a thorough check on consumer regularity based on every order date. An exception to this policy is for those customers undergoing serious health conditions like autoimmune diseases and cancer. 

Traya’s Holistic 3 Science Formula 

Traya’s 3 Science Formula is a synergistic mix of Ayurveda, Allopathy & Food Science designed specifically to cater to hair loss conditions stemming from multiple root causes. With clinically tested ingredients and adaptogenic herbs, Traya’s Science-Backed formula clears internal blockages and boosts hair regeneration naturally. When blended with a healing dietary plan, it delivers great results in attaining long-term hair growth. 

Traya Free hair test (™) 

Traya’s Hair Dx test is powered by a proprietary algorithm to examine a user's hair & health profile. With the help of a distinctive image-capturing technique & physician- formulated examination, it is able to precisely diagnose the type, stage & root causes of a certain hair loss condition. 

2 lakh+ Indians 

Traya Free hair test (™) has been taken by more than 2 lakh+ Indians - Data acquired from Traya customers. 

Ayush Certified  - Digest Boost, Cholest Vati and Consti Clear are Ayush Certified Products.

Traya’s Ayurvedic Products are based on natural and Ayurvedic formulations. These are completely safe for human use, but it is possible that certain ingredients may cause allergic reactions to some individuals. 

Accurate hair diagnosis

The Traya free hair test (™) is a proprietary algorithm developed with the help of our in-house doctors that provides Accurate hair and health diagnosis, provided you mention all the correct details about yourself. It gives a precise diagnosis about the type, stage and root cause of a specific hair fall condition.

Long Lasting Visible Hair Results 

Traya’s complete treatment gives visible and long-lasting results provided you’re on Traya’s hair maintenance kit. Since Traya works on the internal root causes of hair fall and hence our customers have seen long lasting results

Trusted by 70+ Doctors

Traya has been tried and loved by over 70 doctors all over India to maintain healthy hair growth. 

Award Winning Trusted Brand

India’s Healthcare Excellence initiated by Brands Impact has awarded Traya as the Most Effective Haircare Product of the Year 2022 

FDA approved ingredients 

Traya contains hair growth actives like minoxidil and DHT blocker which are FDA approved to treat hair fall. These are completely safe for human use, but it is possible that certain ingredients may cause allergic reactions to some individuals.

 

Traya Women Santulan (™)

Traya’s Women Santulan is a unique technology that uses a combination of herbs treated in a specific manner (kalpa) to meet the bio-specific needs of women going through different stages of life. Santulan is a supplementary range to Traya’s 3 Science Formula which balances and nourishes the body inside-out delivering long-lasting hair growth results and overall health.

settings.heading: Do I need to follow the diet?
settings.row_content: Diet is important because everything we eat affects our body and our hair. Certain foods we normally eat in our daily life like sugary sweets and dairy harm our internal health which leads to poor health for our hair. That's why Traya's nutritionists create a customised diet plan considering the root cause of your hair fall, and is designed to provide the right environment for healthy hair growth while ensuring that your internal health is awesome!

settings.heading: How long does it take to see results?
settings.row_content: On an average, customers see results with Traya's treatment in 5 months. However, the exact time to see these results also depends on factors like age, type, stage, and the causes behind your hair loss like stress,hormonal imbalances, poor diet, etc. Staying consistent with our treatment also ensures faster, more effective results, as over 2.5 lakh other Indians have already seen.

settings.heading: Where is my prescription?
settings.row_content: When your kit is delivered, you can access your digital prescription by scanning the code inside the box. You can also view your prescription by logging into the Traya app or website.

settings.heading: Will Traya’s treatment make my hair thicker?
settings.row_content: Yes, Traya’streatment helps promote hair growth and thickness by using our holistic 3 science formula which combines the goodness of ayurveda, clinically tested products and the right nutrition which creates a healthy environment to improve the overall health of your hair, making it thicker and stronger.

settings.heading: Does the treatment reduce dandruff?
settings.row_content: Yes, Traya's antifungal treatment gets rid of dandruff-causing fungus which helps improve your hair’s health and soothes your scalp while making  sure that the flakiness and itchiness  is reduced. Aloe vera in our treatment helps heal and refreshes your scalp to ensure that you are free from scalp irritation.

settings.heading: Is Traya’s treatment safe?
settings.row_content: Absolutely! Traya's complete treatment is not only safe and toxin free but also doctor-prescribed. Traya's treatment plans also have NO SIDE EFFECTS.

settings.heading: Does Traya’s treatment cause allergies?
settings.row_content: Traya's treatment does not contain any harmful chemicals, making it extremely safe for use. However,  It is always advisable to consult with your hair coach, in case you have any specific allergy concerns or skin sensitivities.

settings.heading: Can women of all ages take Traya’s treatment?
settings.row_content: Yes, Traya's treatment helps women of all age groups. We work hard to ensure that your treatment plan is customised and personalised to your age group, hair fall type, your stage and internal root causes your hair fall. You will also have a  hair coach assigned to you to ensure that we are able to give you the support you personally require on your journey.

settings.heading: Can Traya’s treatment be used with other hair care products?
settings.row_content: While Traya's complete treatment works holistically to tackle your hair issues. Organic shampoos, serums can be used for hair care needs. Please ensure when choosing products to use that they are toxin free and won’t have a negative impact on the health of your hair.

settings.heading: Does the treatment help with PCOS related hair fall?
settings.row_content: YES!. Our PCOS Santulan is an ayurvedic formulation that manages PCOS and also balances your hormones. Traya's Santulan technology is designed for women of all ages and stages of life. The Ayurvedic herbs in the santulan ensure incredible internal health, which, combined with the rest of our treatment and diet, helps to reflect on the outside in the form of great hair.

settings.heading: Will the treatment help with post-pregnancy (postpartum) related hair fall?
settings.row_content: YES! Post-pregnancy hair fall is a common concern for many women who have recently given birth, and it is caused by hormonal imbalances due to after childbirth Traya's Mom Santulan is designed to support new mothers, address such hormonal imbalances and promote hair growth. We understand the sensitivity and criticality of this stage in a mother’s life, Mom Santulan has been made of ingredients that are plant-based and completely safe for lactating women and their breastfed babies.

settings.heading: Does the treatment help for thyroid related hair fall?
settings.row_content: Yes, thyroid-related hair fall is typically caused by imbalances as a result of poor thyroid function, and Traya's Thyro Santulan is made with ayurvedic herbs  that help control thyroid hormones inside the body naturally.

settings.heading: Is Minoxidil safe to use for females?
settings.row_content: YES! Minoxidil has been thoroughly researched and tested before being certified to be safe and effective for women. Minoxidil however should not be taken by women when they are pregnant or breastfeeding. It is also advisable to check in with your hair coach if you have any doubts with the application of minoxidil as well.

settings.heading: Why is my hair falling after I started using Minoxidil?
settings.row_content: If you notice hair shedding in the first few weeks of using minoxidil, it is working for you. When the new hair growth cycle begins, the old hair falls off. This hair loss will be replaced by new hair growth. In the next few weeks, the hair shedding will stop and will be replaced with new healthy hair growth.

settings.heading: What to do if the scalp becomes dry after using Minoxidil?
settings.row_content: It is normal to notice dryness and flaky scalp within the first 1-2 months of using minoxidil as the scalp is adjusting to the medication and the dead skin is peeling off. If you still feel like you are experiencing this after 2 months, connect with your hair coach who will help you further.
